summary: This is an email update regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, reporting that he was removed from Psychological Observation and placed in the SHU (Special Housing Unit) on the morning of July 10, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced by number #76318-054, who was removed from Psychological Observation and placed in the SHU.

persons.name: Ph.D. Forensic Psychologist LT
persons.context: The author of the email update, a forensic psychologist with the U.S. Public Health Service working at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

connections.description: The forensic psychologist is providing a status update on inmate Epstein's psychological observation and housing status.

events.title: Epstein removed from Psychological Observation
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein was removed from Psychological Observation and placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was removed from Psychological Observation on July 10, 2019.
Epstein was placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The document indicates Epstein was not on Suicide Watch at the time of this update.
The update was sent by a forensic psychologist with the U.S. Public Health Service working at the correctional facility.
